summary: A retexture for the thieves guild armour
descriptionHtml:
Does anyone else think the thieves guild armour looks too much like leather? well i certainly do. 

This retexture changes to leather brown colour a much darker grey, which is logical for sneaking about in shadows. It also adds a gold trimming to the main armour to give it a bit of highlighting.

This is my third retexture so im still learning, please give me feedback so i can improve XD If something doesnt work then let me know!

Also have a look at my other retextures;

Dragonscale:    http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1676
Dragonbone:    http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1476

Thankyou and please endorse! XD
author: Lazersights6
